Analysis of yield data from the commercial fisheries in either the ocean or rivers may detect possible over- exploitation and implementation of a proper adaptative fishery management for sea lamprey. Fishways monitoring can provide crucial information regarding fishways efficiency and contribute to mitigate impacts associated with barriers to migration.
